Portable Counter-Strike 1.6 - Play the world's number 1 online action game. Engage in an incredibly realistic brand of terrorist warfare in this wildly popular team-based game. Ally with teammates to complete strategic missions. Take out enemy sites. Rescue hostages. Your role affects your team's success. Your team's success affects your role. Once the round has ended, surviving players retain their equipment for use in the next round; players who were killed begin the next round with the basic default starting equipment. Half-Life single and multiplayer included.

Additional info:    Latest engine updates    Play in LAN and Internet    Listen servers    Dedicated servers    Protocol version 47    Half-Life (single and multiplayer) included    Spam chat controll    Czero bots adapted to cs1.6     100 New and different sprays !    Cheat protection    Added voice communication
